item.title: Trading in Tapes for Clouds...
item.description: You would not believe how many vendors & ISV’s I talk to throught the workweek. On any given day, I usually have to tell some poor sap “NO”, or “I am unintrested in your products, please stop calling”! It does take an enormous ammount of paitentce not to just hang up the phone, but I digress. The other day I got a rather interesting call, this Vendor wanted to inform me of the Tremendous Cost Savings that my employer can obtain by using their new product.
